summary.blockquote:
WARNINGThis interface of this property is deprecated in the Navigation Timing Level 2 specification. Please use the
interface instead.

remarks.para:
The legacy
PerformanceTiming.domContentLoadedEventStart
read-only property returns an unsigned long long representing the moment,
in milliseconds since the UNIX epoch, right before the parser sent the
event, that is right after all the scripts that need to be
executed right after parsing has been executed.
